gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all screen tabs available in the Jira Cloud platform to understand the layout of my project's screens.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of all screen tabs with their respective details, such as tab IDs and names.

gold.user: As a developer, I need to get all tabs for a specific screen to ensure I am aware of all the fields available for that screen.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of tabs associated with the specified screen ID, including their names and positions.

gold.user: As a product owner, I want to add a new tab to a specific screen to organize my fields better.
gold.ideal: The API should successfully create a new tab and return the details of the newly created tab, including its ID and name.

gold.user: As a team lead, I need to remove an unnecessary tab from a screen to streamline the user interface.
gold.ideal: The API should confirm the deletion of the specified tab and return a success message.

gold.user: As a UX designer, I want to rename a tab to better reflect its purpose for the users.
gold.ideal: The API should update the tab's name and return the updated tab details, confirming the change.

gold.user: As a scrum master, I want to rearrange the order of tabs on a screen to improve the workflow for my team.
